content: day 12 / 24 it s time for a gift abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring tlo - third loop only time 1 h slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material yarnart jeans half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hook 2 mm written pattern row 0 chain 11 turn row 1 half_double_crochet 10 chain turn total 10 row 2 half_double_crochet tlo 10 chain turn total 10 row 3 half_double_crochet flo 10 chain turn total 10 repeat rounds 2 and 3 until you reach a square for me it was 6 row one side of the square should remain plain back that s why row 2 has half_double_crochet tlo and row 3 has half_double_crochet flo border turn your work 90 deg slip_stitch around the square - two slip_stitch in each side of half_double_crochet one sl st in each top of the stitch cut the yarn weave the ends in ribbon chain 40 cut the yarn make a bow and sew it to the gift hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the gift congratulations you finished the 12th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 12 to go
